articles.title: Science News Roundup: FDA panel says Vertex/CRISPR to assess safety risks of gene therapy in follow-up study; Dinosaur-killing asteroid impact fouled Earth's atmosphere with dust and more - Devdiscourse
articles.description: But the coup de grâce for many species may have been the climate catastrophe that unfolded in the following years as the skies were darkened by clouds of debris and temperatures plunged.  Europe's space agency boss sees progress on Ariane 6 launcher  Europe's…
